snippet: Mario Draghi, the head of the European Central Bank, is having a tough time convincing the region’s governments of the urgency of economic overhauls.
lead_paragraph: Mario Draghi, the head of the European Central Bank, is having a tough time convincing the region’s governments of the urgency of economic overhauls.

headline.print_headline: After Saving the Euro, Draghi Struggles to Be Heard
headline.main: After Saving the Euro, Draghi Struggles to Be Heard
